name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Node Engineer with 10+ years of experience in full stack development, specializing in **Node.js**, **React**, and CI/CD practices. Adept at building secure and scalable applications, leveraging **Docker** for containerization and deploying REST APIs to enhance user experience. Proven expertise in implementing authentication protocols such as **OAuth2** and **SAML** for Single Sign-On (SSO) solutions. Strong understanding of module bundling and infrastructure-as-code methodologies to streamline deployment processes.

Highly proficient in modern technologies including **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with extensive experience using **FastAPI** and **Django**. Demonstrated ability in developing enterprise-grade platforms that integrate real-time analytics and intelligent decision-making through AI/ML capabilities. Experienced in microservices architecture, and exceptional skills in debugging and technical documentation.

A collaborative communicator who prioritizes delivering high-performance software solutions that meet compliance standards, while being passionate about driving meaningful impact through technology.
